tasks.title: Deduplicate Helm chart sources
tasks.description: Adopt a single mas-iam-stack chart (prefer the operator copy), then remove the stray charts/mas-iam-stack tree or replace it with tooling (symlink, git submodule, or packaging script). Add CI/docs so future edits cannot drift.

tasks.title: Fix operator RBAC for OpenShift
tasks.description: Update config/rbac/role.yaml so the generated CSV grants access to RBAC (roles/rolebindings) and securitycontextconstraints. Regenerate bundle + manifests/install-olm.yaml to eliminate manual oc adm policy steps.

tasks.title: Harden TLS bootstrap job
tasks.description: Provide a purpose-built image containing openssl, restrict the Role to the target Secret, and remove plaintext password logging. Document how to retrieve the truststore password from the Secret instead of pod logs.

tasks.title: Split install manifest
tasks.description: Break manifests/install-olm.yaml into (1) CRD+CatalogSource+Subscription and (2) sample MasIamStack + dev secrets. Update docs so users apply the sample only after the CSV is ready.

tasks.title: Eliminate baked-in credentials
tasks.description: Move Keycloak/Postgres/OpenLDAP passwords out of values.yaml and the sample CR. Require callers to supply Secret references and fail templates when inputs are missing.

tasks.title: Default OpenLDAP to secure posture
tasks.description: Enable persistence, runAsNonRoot, fsGroup, and resource requests by default; require explicit opt-out. Document SCC requirements accordingly.

tasks.title: Bring reset-namespace.sh in line with docs
tasks.description: Either stop deleting mas-iam-sample-keycloak-openldap-tls or gate it behind --purge-tls, and update help text/tests.

tasks.title: Repo hygiene
tasks.description: Remove generated artifacts (bundle_tmp*, body.json, headers.txt, operators/.../database/index.db) and extend .gitignore so they donâ€™t return.

tasks.title: SCIM server enablement
tasks.description: Bundle the Keycloak SCIM extension, expose the Helm/CR knobs, and document how to seed the service-account roles + client credentials for MAS integrations.
